Summary: Linting produced error when -I is used
Description:
Using Verilator in the OpenLane flow produces a linting fail, which is documented here: The-OpenROAD-Project/OpenLane#1811
It seems like verilated_std.sv is auto-included multiple times, triggering an error the 2nd time.
Verilator version: 947402b
Addition info on OpenLane can be provided by @kareefardi
